it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.observer.Observable<ModelUpdate>
      • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.player.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<ModelUpdate>, RemoteObserver<ModelUpdate>, Remote

    public class Player
extends Observable<ModelUpdate>
implements Observer<ModelUpdate>
    Represents a player of the match. Holds the following information:
    • Name and color which uniquely identify the player, along with the color
    • Score which indicates the number of points accumulated by this player, along with the number of killshots and overkills he performed
    • Action card which indicates which and how many actions the player can perform during his turn
    • Player Board which contains information about the damage and marks
    • Weapons and Powerups are two collections with the cards that the players has in his hands
    • Ammo cubes owned by the player
    • square the player is currently in
    • Operational state which indicates whether the player is active and can play a turn or not
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini, Lorenzo Farinelli, Tiziano Fucci

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int INITIAL_AMMO
      Load the initial cubes of each color a player has at the beginning of a match Fall back to a default value of 1 cube per color if none is set
      static int MAX_AMMO_CUBES
      Load the maximum number of cubes for each color a player can have Fall back to a default value of 3 cubes per color if none is set
      static int MAX_POWERUPS
      Load the maximum number of powerup cards a player can hold Fall back to a default value of 3 powerup cards if none is set
      static int MAX_WEAPONS
      Load the maximum number of weapons cards a player can hold Fall back to a default value of 3 weapon cards if none is set

      Constructor and Description
      Player(String name, ActionCard actionCard, PlayerColor color)
      Constructs a player who is ready to play: sets counters to zero and sets initial ammo cubes.

        name - server-unique nickname
        actionCard - pre-built action card, may be shared with other players
        color - color of the chosen character

      • addWeapon

        public void addWeapon(WeaponCard weapon)
               throws FullCapacityException
        Add a weapon card in player's hands. Also takes care of the fact that you cannot have more than more than MAX_WEAPONS cards.
        Parameters:
        weapon - weapon card that should be added, not null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if weapon is null
        FullCapacityException - if the weapon limit has been reached

      • removeWeapon

        public WeaponCard removeWeapon(String weaponId)
        Removes a weapon card from player's hands and resets it.
        Parameters:
        weaponId - identifier of the weapon, not null and not an empty string
        Returns:
        weapon card drawn from player
        Throws:
        CardNotFoundException - if the requested card is not owned by the player

      • removeWeapon

        Parameters:
        weapon - weapon card to be removed
        Returns:
        weapon card drawn from player
        Throws:
        CardNotFoundException - if the requested card is not in available in this square

      • addAmmo

        public void addAmmo(Map<AmmoCube,Integer> ammo)
        Adds ammo cubes to the current player. If given ammo exceed capacity, they are simply discarded.
        Parameters:
        ammo - a map containing the quantity of ammo cubes to add for each color, unspecified keys are treated as zero, not null and not containing negative values

      • addAmmo

        public void addAmmo(AmmoCube ammoCube)
        Adds ammo cube to the current player. If given ammo exceeds capacity, it is simply discarded.
        Parameters:
        ammoCube - The ammo cube to be added, not null

      • payAmmo

        public void payAmmo(Map<AmmoCube,Integer> ammo)
             throws NotEnoughAmmoException
        Removes ammo cubes from current player.
        Parameters:
        ammo - a map containing the quantity of ammo cubes to remove for each color, unspecified keys are treated as zero, not null and not containing negative values
        Throws:
        NotEnoughAmmoException - if the player does not have enough ammo to pay the specified amount
